name: eccomerce-app-server
description: ```ecommerce-app/ ├── docker-compose.yml # Docker Compose for container management ├── gateway/ # API Gateway (optional, for routing between services) ├── user-service/ # User management microservice ├── product-service/ # Product catalog microservice ├── order-service/ # Order processing microservice ├── shared-libraries/ # Shared code (e.g., logging, auth utilities) └── README.md ```
